summary: This is an email chain from December 2020 discussing the approval process for a new client seeking therapy through the FBI Victim Services Division. The client is identified as a confirmed victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The emails show internal confusion about whether proper approval was granted for the victim to begin counseling sessions.

persons.name: M.S.
persons.context: A licensed psychotherapist certified in sexual abuse trauma who reached out to inform the FBI Victim Services Division that they will begin treating a confirmed victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Scheduled therapy session for Epstein victim
events.description: A confirmed victim of Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled to begin therapy treatment with a licensed psychotherapist.

locations.name: Greenacres, Florida 33463
locations.context: Location of the licensed psychotherapist's practice.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was processing a new client who is a confirmed victim of Jeffrey Epstein for therapy services in late 2020.
Internal emails show confusion about whether proper approval was granted for the victim to begin counseling, with one staff member admitting they were wrong about receiving approval.
A licensed psychotherapist from Greenacres, Florida was scheduled to begin treating the victim on December 8, 2020.
